column2: "I heard that Zieg guy has been asking an awful lot from you lately!"
"When that old geezer gets worked up, he starts acting like this. Pretty troublesome."
"So what's he asking you to do?"
"Some weapon you found before? So basically stuff to do with that?"
"It's not like I knew, but I had a feeling that's what it was about."
"If you're looking for other pieces, it's not like you have no clues to go on."
"Think about it... The Darkers and that creepy masked guy are both looking for something, right?"
"So it stands to reason... Wouldn't it be somewhere where those guys show up?"
"So your first step should be finding out where they've been."
"Anyway, I'll contact you if I find anything. Later!"
